text.div:
VhDir Healthcare Service Eligibility

This code system contains codes for documenting the attributes of eligibility for health care services.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/healthcareservice-eligibility defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
adult AdultEligibility for this service requires the patient to be of legal age.

name: VhDir_cs_healthcareservice_eligibility
title: VhDir Healthcare Service Eligibility
description: This code system contains codes for documenting the attributes of eligibility for health care services.

concept.definition: Eligibility for this service requires the patient to be of legal age.
